verbose_text: Infection of first-trimester decidua with either the pLenti6 / V5-EmGFP-hum-PROK1-72 or -287 significantly reduced levels of both CTGF mRNA (0.76 +/- 0.08-fold and 0.74 +/- 0.03-fold; P < 0.01; Fig. XREF_FIG F) and secreted CTGF (0.81 +/- 0.07-fold and 0.72 +/- 0.06-fold; Fig. XREF_FIG G) when compared with the negative scrambled control construct.
